cab.content: fmmk Dally JowJi^Document is10 ProSECRET.BATTLE SITUATION NOON - 24-th MAY 1918.I. iu1161* Last night we discharged about 4000 cylinders ofgas in the neighbourhood of LENS.-2. This morning there is no change in the general situation.General Staff,War Office, S.W.1, 24th May 1918.Issued at 12.55 p.m0
